name: cdt-gdb-adapter
description: gdb adapter implementing the debug adapter protocol

scripts.docker:build: docker run --rm -it -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel):/work -w /work/$(git rev-parse --show-prefix) --cap-add=SYS_PTRACE --security-opt seccomp=unconfined quay.io/eclipse-cdt/cdt-infra-eclipse-full:latest yarn
scripts.docker:test: docker run --rm -it -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel):/work -w /work/$(git rev-parse --show-prefix) --cap-add=SYS_PTRACE --security-opt seccomp=unconfined quay.io/eclipse-cdt/cdt-infra-eclipse-full:latest yarn test
scripts.test: yarn test:integration && yarn test:pty && yarn test:integration-run-in-terminal && yarn test:integration-remote-target && yarn test:integration-remote-target-run-in-terminal && yarn test:integration-gdb-async-off && yarn test:integration-gdb-async-off-remote-target && yarn test:integration-gdb-non-stop && test:integration-gdb-non-stop-remote-target
scripts.test:integration: cross-env JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=test-reports/integration.xml JUNIT_REPORT_STACK=1 JUNIT_REPORT_PACKAGES=1 mocha --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter dist/integration-tests/*.spec.js
scripts.test:integration-run-in-terminal: cross-env JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=test-reports/integration-run-in-terminal.xml JUNIT_REPORT_STACK=1 JUNIT_REPORT_PACKAGES=1 mocha --run-in-terminal --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter dist/integration-tests/*.spec.js
scripts.test:integration-remote-target: cross-env JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=test-reports/integration-remote-target.xml JUNIT_REPORT_STACK=1 JUNIT_REPORT_PACKAGES=1 mocha --test-remote --timeout 5000 --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter dist/integration-tests/*.spec.js
scripts.test:integration-remote-target-run-in-te: cross-env JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=test-reports/integration-remote-target-run-in-terminal.xml JUNIT_REPORT_STACK=1 JUNIT_REPORT_PACKAGES=1 mocha --test-remote --timeout 5000 --run-in-terminal --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter dist/integration-tests/*.spec.js
scripts.test:integration-gdb-async-off: cross-env JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=test-reports/integration-gdb-async-off.xml JUNIT_REPORT_STACK=1 JUNIT_REPORT_PACKAGES=1 mocha --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter dist/integration-tests/*.spec.js --test-gdb-async-off
scripts.test:integration-gdb-async-off-remote-ta: cross-env JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=test-reports/integration-gdb-async-off-remote-target.xml JUNIT_REPORT_STACK=1 JUNIT_REPORT_PACKAGES=1 mocha --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter dist/integration-tests/*.spec.js --timeout 5000 --test-gdb-async-off --test-remote
scripts.test:integration-gdb-non-stop: cross-env JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=test-reports/integration-gdb-non-stop.xml JUNIT_REPORT_STACK=1 JUNIT_REPORT_PACKAGES=1 mocha --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter dist/integration-tests/*.spec.js --test-gdb-non-stop
scripts.test:integration-gdb-non-stop-remote-tar: cross-env JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=test-reports/integration-gdb-non-stop-remote-target.xml JUNIT_REPORT_STACK=1 JUNIT_REPORT_PACKAGES=1 mocha --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter dist/integration-tests/*.spec.js --test-gdb-non-stop --test-remote
scripts.test:pty: cross-env JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=test-reports/native.xml JUNIT_REPORT_STACK=1 JUNIT_REPORT_PACKAGES=1 mocha --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter dist/native/*.spec.js

author: Eclipse CDT
